```{r}

theday <- '2022-06-9'

SB_Processed<- read.csv("./processed_data/SB/SB_processed_CR800.csv")
SB_6_7<-SB_Processed%>%
  mutate(day=date(TIMESTAMP))%>%
  filter(day==theday)

TP_Processed<- read.csv("./processed_data/TP/TP_processed_CR800.csv")
TP_6_7<-TP_Processed%>%
  mutate(day=date(TIMESTAMP))%>%
  filter(day==theday)

EB_Processed<- read.csv("./processed_data/EB/EB_processed_CR800.csv")
EB_6_7<-EB_Processed%>%
  mutate(day=date(TIMESTAMP))%>%
  filter(day==theday)

NN_Processed<- read.csv("./processed_data/NN/NN_processed_CR800.csv")
NN_6_7<-NN_Processed%>%
  mutate(day=date(TIMESTAMP))%>%
  filter(day==theday)

compareplot<- ggplot()+
  geom_line(data = EB_6_7, aes(x = RECORD, y = LWmV_50ft_Avg))+
  geom_point(data= EB_6_7, aes(x = RECORD, y = LWmV_66ft_Avg)) +
  geom_line(data= EB_6_7, aes(x = RECORD, y = LWmV_17ft_Avg, color="red"))+
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90))

compareplot
```
